name: Ball Run (itch) (Gre Loayon)
description:
This is my first Unity Game called Ball Run. Use the joystick on the corner of the screen to reach to the end. Watch out for the walls and don't fall off the edge.

Only builds available are PC and Android.

Also sorry for the terrible phone video, I don't use OBS/other recording software, nor do I plan on using it long term.
